publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-798.2 Tommy Sheridan: Fisheries Council December 2003-As an amendment to motion (S2M-798) in the name of Richard Lochhead, leave out from "and therefore" to end and insert "supports the fishermen in whatever action they choose to take, including civil disobedience, to safeguard their livelihood and their communities and calls on the Scottish Executive to withdraw its support for this agreement and demand an immediate renegotiation of the agreement."
